text: OVERTIME SPORTS FAN INSIGHTS SPORTS VIEWERSHIP INSIGHTS (ONLY THOSE WHO ARE FANS) SPORTS PLAYED - OT Fans are avid fans of an average of 7 different sports (2.5x as many as Gen Pop) - On average, OT fans who are a fan of each of the sports below watch an average of 15 different sports - OT Fans currently play an average of 3 sports - OT Fans are avid fans of over 9 different sports leagues (2.8x as many as Gen Pop) - Streaming has surpassed cable, where OT fans are more likely to lean on streaming services to watch live sports - Basketball and gaming are the two most popular sports among OT Fans - OT Fans are avid fans of over 2.5 different women's sports leagues (2.8x as many as Gen Pop) - Across sports, leagues, and women's sports, football and basketball are the two most watched sports - OT fans over-index on currently playing ALL sports listed below

text: OT fans of these leagues ➡️\nare also fans \nof these leagues ⬇️ SPORTS FANDOM OVERLAP

metadata.text_as_html: OT fans of these leagues ➡️\nare also fans \nof these leagues ⬇️SPORTS FANDOM OVERLAP

text:
Commentary: 
OT fans are avid fans of an average of 9 different sports leagues, which is 2.8x as many as Gen Pop. The above is an effort to demonstrate the overlap of these sports fans and leagues.
Each column at the top is representative of ALL OT fans who are fans of that league; each row on the left represents the percent of OT fans who are also fans of the respective league.
For example, 92% of NCAAF fans are also fans of the NFL, and 64% of NFL fans are also fans of NCAAF.
Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Fandom, 2024
